Login

*
Name is required.

*
Password is required.


Signup now
import { Component, HostBinding, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { name: any; password: any; loading:boolean=false; constructor(private router: Router, private apiService: ApiService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } onclick() { console.log("Click"); this.loading = true; // Simulating asynchronous operation with setTimeout setTimeout(() => { // Perform your login logic here // Hide spinner after operation completes this.loading = false; }, 10000); if (this.name && this.password) { this.apiService.getProducts().subscribe((data) => { console.log('Products:', data); const obj = { name: this.name, password: this.password }; console.log(obj); // console.log(this.name) // console.log(this.password) this.router.navigate(['/add-income']) }); } }
